FILE (GLOB_RECURSE CXX_SRC_FILES "${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/src/*.cpp")

ADD_LIBRARY (imtexteditor STATIC ${CXX_SRC_FILES})

TARGET_COMPILE_DEFINITIONS (imtexteditor PUBLIC "_CRT_SECURE_NO_WARNINGS")

TARGET_INCLUDE_DIRECTORIES (imtexteditor PUBLIC "${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/include")
TARGET_INCLUDE_DIRECTORIES (imtexteditor PUBLIC "${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/include/imtexteditor")

TARGET_LINK_LIBRARIES (imtexteditor PUBLIC imgui)
